issue.title: [C++] Implement casting List <-> LargeList
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6072](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6072). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should implement bidirectional casts from List to LargeList and vice-versa.

In the narrowing direction, the offset width should be checked.
